name: Beyond the Void
description:
Beyond the Void (BtV) is a unique combination of strategy and 1vs1 competitive game that takes place in a world between science-fiction and fantasy.
Experience the thrill of being a mercenary captain! Take command of a mothership that complements your style of playing and draft its skills. You’ve got only one true goal: To forge a strong fleet and conquer your opponent’s home planet! Now, Captain, balance your strategy and resources to win the war…Beyond the void!

  • Challenge your friends to 1vs1 online matches, train against the AI, or compete in ranked games.
  • First, DRAFT the skills of your mothership to fit your strategy. Collect resources and conquer neutral planets as you forge your fleet and improve your mothership’s statistics.
  • Then, DESTROY your opponent’s fleet as you lead your powerful army through an epic space war. Your skills as a player are your best tool.
  • Last, DOMINATE the game, defeat the enemy by conquering their base planet. Your victory is the first step toward building your reputation amongst the BtV community. Fight for the top rank.

Beyond the Void is revolutionary, offering true ownership of game items in its digital second-hand market, which is based on the Ethereum blockchain.
Beyond the Void is a free to play competitive game. Players have the opportunity to unlock or purchase cosmetics items to stand out and be easily recognized by your fans during tournaments.



You, the game-player, are witnessing the birth of a revolutionary concept in gaming: True ownership of digital assets. In other words, everything you own in BtV also exists outside of, and independent from, the game platform.
With traditional game platforms, you leave your winnings and game assets behind the moment you leave the platform. They only exist within that world, and that world can be taken away from you at any time; by a business or technical failure, by a ban.
In contrast, your blockchain-enabled game assets (e.g., avatars, motherships, skins, chest, ...), are portable. They exist inside and outside the game platform. You own them and can do what you want with them. You can buy, sell, and trade them directly with other people. You can offer them for sale at the shop.

Shop features:
  • A variety of skins, avatars, titles, holotag, event cards and packs are available.
  • Your assets are yours. You can buy, sell or trade them on the shop.
  • Nexium is an ERC20 token used to buy items in the online shop.
  • Nexium token is compatible with MyEtherWallet.
  • More free and premium content will be added on a regular basis thanks to the great work of the development team.

To support our continuous cycle of play/iterate/improve, use the “Report a bug” button in the game or mention it in the “Feedback” channel on our Discord. We’ll use your feedback for our official release :)
Let’s get to know each other on social media and discuss game polishing :)
